title: I am a lover of things pine and forest-like
body: When I first sprayed this perfume, I was thrown off by the powdery and alcohol smell it gave off. This made me nervous for what was to come after this faded away, but when it did, the scent was lovely. I could smell the point, as well as other elements within the perfume. It was forward but gentle in scent and carries well through the day. I am a lover of things pine and forest-like, and this gives a wonderful reminiscence of just that. It's light but delivers well. I even got a few compliments on this my first time wearing it. The scent is not feminine or masculine, it is quite neutral. I will be repurchasing this when I am through with my bottle. Side note, this pairs wonderfully with the body wash and cream.

title: Overall good fragrance
body:
Like a lot of other reviews said, this fragrance definitely gives off a bit of a powdery scent and isn't as intensely pine-scented as I would have expected. Nevertheless, it is a wonderfully light and soft scent that is floral-focused with woody notes of pine and sandalwood. It could be gender-neutral but I definitely get a more feminine vibe from it.

Definitely a lovely scent and does evoke the imagery of a pine grove in bright sunlight. I will use and enjoy this product but likely won't purchase it again unless it goes on sale (which is why I bought it in the first place) Love BoJ products and will be shopping with them again for my skincare needs!

title: Powdery scent, not very pine-y
body: I wouldn't purchase it again, but it's fine. It's not my favorite.

title: PINE STRAW
body: Do not recommend. I thought this would smell nice and woody it‚Äôs smells like mash pine straw in a bottle. It‚Äôs not a good perfume to buy on a whim.

title: Fav perfume
body: My absolute favourite perfume ever.

title: Pretty
body: I really like how this perfume smells. It's nice, light, and unique. It's described as a pine scent, which I can pick up on when I first spray it, but it fades into a more perfumey, floralish scent. I normally don't like perfumey or floral but there's something different about this one. It's comforting and pleasant. The different notes work really well together and it definitely isn't something that'll leave you smelling just like every other woman in the room, it's different (in a good way!) It is a K product and I can't read anything on the box itself, so I'm only going on what the description page says that the notes are. It lasts a decent amount of time on my clothes and skin and I like how as it fades, it smells different.

title: Too powdery
body: It has a nice scent of forest but is too powdery.

title: Not For Me
body: I found the scent of Pine Grove Teeshell Portrait perfume to be very strong, and I personally don't care for it.

title: This smells good
body: This perfume has my favorite scents. The top notes are bergamot, pine, and eucalyptus. The middle notes are lavender, lotus, and rosemary. And the base notes are cedarwood and musk. This is fairly long lasting (a few hours) and is not overpowering. I like an elegant glass bottle. Receive compliments on this light floral scent. The main complaint is the scent isn't too strong for the price of $45. Other than that, I am completely satisfied.

title: Woody fragrance, doesn't last too long
body: This fragrance is true of the pine groves. Initially when I sprayed it, I didn't really like the fragrance that much but after a few minutes the fragrance was more soothing and a woody fragrance. It is not too strong but overall pleasing. One concern is that the fragrance doesn't last very long. In a few hours of spraying it, I could barely smell it. Considering the price, it is a bit expensive for short lived fragrance.

title: Nice Fresh scent
body: The scent reminds me of walking in a pine forest for sure. It is a soft clean smell. The scent last throughout the day. I don‚Äôt see myself wearing it much personally, but I will use it to touch up the living room or maybe a bedroom because of its clean smell so I find it more functional as a room spray.

title: Ok Overall
body: I wasn't a big fan of this scent for myself or my partner. It doesn't project very well and seems to work better as a room spray or for fabrics vs. direct skin.

title: Strong if not overpowering
body:
If you are a fan of incense, this might be for you. I, and my daughter, cannot pinpoint the slightly off smell but overall, it has an earthy, forest-like smell.

A little disappointing.

title: Different
body: While the perfume is not my preference it smells nice.

title: Complex scent, not Pine Tree!
body: First of all, I think the name gives the wrong impression as this is so much more than a so called pine grove! This, even when first applied is not piney, to me at least. Complex, kind of powdery, green earthy. I wish I could describe this adequately because it really deserves better description than mine! Even my husband couldn't pick out one particular note. I find it subtle and haven't worn enough to judge how long it lasts. Like it but does it deserve cost? Don't know that yet :)

title: Compact, but older üëµüèº lady musky notes
body:
Arrived tampered sealed.
It‚Äôs very mature musky scented. Something I‚Äôd gift to my Yiayia üëµüèº if she was still around‚Ä¶.
It‚Äôs not that bad, where it‚Äôs offputting. I think it‚Äôs very strong at first, but lightens up after. Simply it‚Äôs, not my style, but you may like it.

title: it's pretty nice
body:
this starts out with a strong, powdery pine scent that quickly fades into a more floral note, vaguely reminiscent of a bouquet, but without being too flowery and still retaining a kind of woodsy scent. I think this is a pretty gender-neutral fragrance.

I probably wouldn't get this again purely because it's not quite the kind of scent I like, but others I had smell it said they liked it.

this seems like it'd be great for gifting; the packaging made this very presentable.

title: Musky up front with a light woody floral finish
body: It‚Äôs a nice earthy scent. I was not sure what to think at first. It has a very musky scent right when you spray it on but soon mellows out. After it sits for a few minutes it does change to a soft earthy floral scent. It‚Äôs a mild scent that definitely can be unisex. It has a nice combination of musk and floral pine scents.

title: Powdery with pine undertones
body:
As others have mentioned, this perfume is much more powdery when you first smell it! It has a light pine/forest undertone, but the overall impression isn‚Äôt what I‚Äôd expect from a scent with this name.

It‚Äôs not unpleasant, just less woodsy than you might imagine. I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs pretty unisex, but not spicy.

The bottle is an elegant glass so it looks nice displayed and feels quality.

title: powdery
body: this scent is so unique, ive never smelled anything like it. you get the pine immediately but then the powder comes through pretty heavy. but its a wonderfully done powder. not grandma smelling. just sweet and pretty pine. i was worried id smell like pinsol, but the smell is far from. its more sweet than anything. i think its a pretty spring time fragrance. probably my new go to

title: Not my favorite
body: This scent smells exactly like described until it settles and dries and then the pine scent disappears. It‚Äôs pretty strong and did give me a headache, but only because I‚Äôm not too fond of this cologne scent once it‚Äôs settles. I feel this a more of a fall/winter scent and I don‚Äôt see myself wearing it at all as a spring/summer scent. The packaging was simple yet elegant

title: Well packaged scent
body: This scent comes beautifully packaged, making it a great gift. I was not wild about the scent, and hey review team- why do you ask how the flavor of a perfume is? I really hope people aren‚Äôt drinking this! It‚Äôs for scent only!

title: Too earthy and woody for my liking
body:
- Upon spraying this perfume for the first time i was immediately repelled. It came off really strong and sharp. The eucalyptus note at the opening combined with pine note reminded me of an essential oil but not in a good way. I generally like bergamot note in perfumes but unfortunately i did not pick up this note in this perfume.
- The dry down is a tad too earthy and woody for my liking. Sadly i just don't like how the eucalyptus note lingers in the dry down and mixes with the base notes. It throws me off.
- The longevity is also not great. It lasts about 2 hours on me.
- Smell is subjective so even if this didn't work me it might work for you especially if you like the smell of eucalyptus and woody and earthy notes in general.

title: I Guess it Depends on What You Like
body:
To me it smells like baby powder and woods.
It wasn't for me, but maybe someone else might like the scent.

Also the scent didn't last long on the skin

title: Its quite a floral blend. The pine is a bit more of a background. Very interesting mix
body:
So I pretty much always give perfumes a 5 star since everyone has their own preferences. Its quite a mix of flowers minus the 'rose' that seems to be popular trend now. In my book this is a plus since I'm not a fan of 'rose' perfumes.
Its quite a balanced multi flower floral scent. Very natural smelling. The pine is an interesting background addition that if you pay attention you can notice it. Its like standing in a flower field next to a pine forest.

Very summer leaning for sure. Feminine mixed floral is how I would describe it. Worth a try if you are really into florals. Longevity seems to be about 5 hours on skin or a day+ on your clothing.

title: Smells real good
body:
Teeshell portrait is an enchanting fragrance that truly captures the essence of elegance and sophistication. The fragrance is perfect for any occasion, whether it's a casual day out or a formal event. The scent is not overpowering, making it perfect for those who prefer a subtle fragrance. The unique combination of scents will definitely make heads turn and leave a lasting impression.

What's great about this perfume is that it is versatile and suitable for both men and women. Its unique blend of scents makes it a perfect choice for anyone who wants to feel confident, elegant, and sophisticated. The elegant glass bottle also adds a touch of luxury to your perfume collection.

Its unique blend of scents, elegant packaging, and versatile nature make it a great addition to any perfume collection.

title: Earthy Fragrance
body: The Beauty of Joseon Pine Grove Eau de Perfume comes in a simple and attractive, 1-ounce bottle. Not being a perfume connoisseur, my description is non-technical ‚Äì I enjoy earthy scents, and this fragrance has a nice mix that reminds me of being outdoors. Overall, a pleasant fragrance and nice for gifting as well.

title: Nice scent, only need one spray
body: I haven't used scents so much in the past but this one I've really enjoyed. I started with a spray on each forearm but I think that was a bit too much for me so I switched to one on my torso in the morning and I really like it. It's enough that I still smell it through my shirt throughout the day but not so much that I feel self conscious about other people thinking the scent is too strong. Definitely recommend.

title: Clean scent
body: Although scent will be very subjective, I love this one. I‚Äôm not a fan of overly sweet or floral fragrances, so this one is perfect. The pine notes definitely come through, but not so much that you smell like a Christmas candle. It‚Äôs clean and crisp, and interacts with my skin well. It lasts almost all day long. This is definitely a new go to!

title: Perfume
body: The scent is great, I personally consider it unisex, pine notes but not overwhelming. Smells very clean and fresh with a hint of mystery. I‚Äôm not a huge scent wearer but I really like this

title: Incredible
body: Great scent. Long lasting but not overpowering. The scent also doesn't change as it fades. Good sized bottle as well. Well worth the price

title: Amazing!
body: This perfume smells incredible and lasts a long time. I haven‚Äôt wanted to wear anything else since I got it. It‚Äôs so light and fresh smelling. I can‚Äôt get enough of it. The bottle isn‚Äôt fancy or frilly. It‚Äôs a nice clean design. I‚Äôm already thinking about ordering more! Highly recommend if you like fresh herbal scents
